dashboard_overview: This is your command center. Projects, drafts, and tools all start here.
builder_start: Click here to create books, courses, frameworks, or archives.
draft_engine: AI-powered writing assistant. Outlines become full manuscripts.
vault_access: Your secure storage. Everything you create lives here forever.
pricing_info: Four tools, four bundles. Pick what you need to build your legacy.
settings_gear: Customize your experience. Work the way you want.
export_button: Download your work in multiple formats.
share_button: Share with collaborators or publish directly.
save_indicator: Auto-saves every 30 seconds. Your work is always safe.
